input.sentences: the snowplow had to clear the road for me to pull my car out .
other rides were already being covered with snow again .
my car was stuck again under 2 feet of snow the next morning .
output.sentences: Looks like its time for Mr. Plow to get to work.
Damn it Mr. Plow we really need your help.
Finally, he showed up and cleared a road.
Not funny Mr. Plow, why did you cover my car in snow.
